title: Why would you remove TT?
body:
I just don't understand? Will it really pull focus from other game modes, not be worth financially to have it updated? it's not like they did it before anyways?
Like many others have stated Riot have been making some questionable decisions lately related to balance chances and now this?
No wonder [League of Legends players in 2019](https://lolskinshop.com/how-many-players-are-still-playing-league-of-legends-in-2019-is-league-of-legends-dying/) are less than you would expect them to be and the growth of the game has stagnated.

Just leave it up for those who wanna play! Many have met through it and if not anything else it's piece of LoL history.
Do few balance changes and don't dedicate people to work for it if it doesn't make sense to you as an investment but leave it as a choice at least.
